listitem0.label: What have I enjoyed and why ?

listitem1.label: What have I learnt and why is it important ?

listitem2.label: What has gone less well and what would I do differently in the future ?

listitem3.label: Did anything get in the way of me achieving my targets? If so, what can I do to stop this happening again?

listitem4.label: What support can I get to help me?

listitem5.label: What targets have I met and how can I show this?

listitem6.label: What is the next step I will take?
